findings.message: The confidence section still states `if buyerEmail` is the
guard, which conflicts with the stricter documented requirement at lines 90/231 (trim + format validation). Resolved by updating Approach confidence wording to specify trim + format validation.
Empty string is falsy and already excluded by truthy guard. Real failure cases are whitespace-only/malformed non-empty strings. Resolved by tightening Resolved section wording.

note: Final round — no further rounds. lp_score 4.5 >= 4.0 threshold — credible.
